Method Detail

getExistingAndNext

public java.util.List<java.io.File> getExistingAndNext()
Get all existing numbered files and, as the last element of the list, the next logically sequenced numbered file.

Allow numbers to be skipped or missing in the sequence, always returning one more than the highest number in the "next" file's name.

Returns:
existing and next files or null if there is an error such as the containing directory not existing or an I/O exception while listing.

getNumber

public int getNumber(java.io.File numberedFile)
Get the number part of the numbered file.

Returns:
the number between the namePrefix and nameSuffix, or -1 if the pattern doesn't match.
